name: Verify Navigation from Main Image Section
description:
As a user of the JPetStore application,
  I want to ensure that the "Catalog" page is displayed correctly and that all elements, links, and text are functioning as expected,
  So that I can confidently navigate through the catalog and access the correct pages.
descriptionHtml:
As a user of the JPetStore application,
I want to ensure that the "Catalog" page is displayed correctly and that all elements, links, and text are functioning as expected,
So that I can confidently navigate through the catalog and access the correct pages.

testStage.description:
As a user of the JPetStore application,
  I want to ensure that the "Catalog" page is displayed correctly and that all elements, links, and text are functioning as expected,
  So that I can confidently navigate through the catalog and access the correct pages.

steps.name: Given I am on the "Welcome" page
Given I click on the "Enter The Store Link"
Given I am on the "Catalog" page
When I click on the "Cats" in the main image section
Then The page title "JPetStore Demo" and the URL "https://petstore.octoperf.com/actions/Catalog.action?viewCategory=&categoryId=CATS" should match the expected value

labels.name: story
labels.value: Verify Navigation from Main Image Section
